diff_hunk:
@@ -49,42 +54,88 @@
 
 
 (defn breadcrumbs-list
-  [& children]
-  (into [:ol (use-style breadcrumbs-list-style) children]))
+  [{:keys [style]} & children]
+  (into [:ol (use-style (merge breadcrumbs-list-style style)) children]))
 
 
 (defn breadcrumb
-  [{:keys [key]} & label]
-  [:li (use-style breadcrumb-style {:key key})
-   [:a {:href "#"} label]])
+  [{:keys [style on-click]} & label]
+  [:li (use-style (merge breadcrumb-style style) {:title label})
+   [:a {:on-click on-click} label]])
 
 
 ;;; Devcards
 
 
 (defcard-rg Normal-Breadcrumb
-  [breadcrumbs-list
+  [breadcrumbs-list {}
body:
The way we are destructuring and then using keys is not ideal, especially in `button`. A better way might be something like

```
(defn button-primary
  [{:keys [style active class] :as props} & children]
  [:button (use-style
             (merge buttons-primary-style style)
             (merge (dissoc props [:style :active :class]) {:class (concat class (when active "active"))}))
   children])
```
Don't need to implement now, but I am requesting you do one-arity functions for these fixes.
